# KnownPatterns.DefaultFilenamePattern field

Returns an array of strings that contains default pattern for log filename. Always returns {ApplicationName}_{Date}.{LogExtension}.

```csharp
public static string DefaultFilenamePattern;
```

## Property Value

Array of string that contains pattern to use.
